data.test-description: Observe the PnicNetworkResourceInfo.availableBandwidthForVMTraffic runtime info should work correctly
Observe the DvsVmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntimeInfo should work correctly
VM with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool is powered on. Observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is updated with the vnic data added
VM with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool is powered off. Observe that the VmBnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is updated with the vnic data added

Configure VM bandwith reservation value with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool, VM is powered on. observe VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info and vnic reservation value are updated.

Configure VM bandwith reservation value with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool, VM is powered off. observe VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info and vnic reservation value are updated.

Two VMs with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool are powered on in order. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is updated with the vnic data added in order.

VM with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool cannot power on if the left quota bandwidth is not enough. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is not updated.

VM with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool cannot power on if the left quota bandwidth is not enough. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is not updated.

VM 1 with vnic connected to a DVPG associated with a VmVnicNetworkResourcePool cannot power on if the left quota bandwidth is not enough. Power off VM 0 which can release the quota bandwidth to make the VM 1 can opwer on. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime info is updated.
Disassociate/Associate a DVPG with vnics connected to it to a VmVnicNetworkResorucePool. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime is updated with the new vnics

Associated two DVPGs with vnics connected to them to separate VmVnicNetworkResorucePools. Move one VM from one resource pool to another resource pool, observe that both VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime are updated.
Observe VmVnicNetworkResourcePoolRuntime when Add,edit and remove of VmVnicResourcePool
Restart the vpxd process. observe that the PnicNetworkResourceInfo.availableBandwidthForVMTraffic runtime info is loaded properly from the database.
Restart the vpxd process. observe that the NetworkResourceManagementCapability.networkResourceControlVersion3Supported is loaded properly from the database.
Restart the vpxd process. observe that the VmVnicNetworkResourceRuntime is loaded properly from the database.
runtime updates after adding and removing physical NICs.
